text.description:
This might be the best restaurant we've ever tried!! If you like Italian food, heck! if you like food in general, you're gonna love seeing some of the traditional and local foods they eat in the Italian mountains!
Thank you for all of your love and support! Don't forget to subscribe and turn on the bell so you never miss a new video! You can also follow us on our other socials below! Ciao for now! -Jessi and Alessio
Our favorite olive oil brand- https://entimio.com/pages/artisanal-evoo-collection
Our TikTok Page- https://www.tiktok.com/@thepasinis Our Insta- https://www.instagram.com/thepasinis/ Jessi's IG- https://www.instagram.com/jessipasini/ Alessio's IG- https://www.instagram.com/alessio_pasini_ Our Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/thepasinis
Shop Our Merch: https://www.bonfire.com/store/thepasinis Shop Our Amazon Storefront: https://www.amazon.com/shop/jessipasini_ Business Inquiries: pasini@henrytalents.com
Did you know we have a BRAND NEW PODCAST? "Pop the Prosecco" with The Pasinis is available on all podcast platforms, Apple podcasts, Spotify, etc. You can also listen on our website- https://poptheprosecco.buzzsprout.com/
text.fulltitle: We Tried A Michelin Restaurant in Italy
